body.p:
Clerks Office Kenton Cir. Court
Covington Ky Oct 27. 1865
To His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlette Gov of Ky

Sir. Enclosed we send you a copy of an Indictment & Bench Warrant against James Washington of color now pending in our Court. We understand the Deft. has fled to Ohio -- Will your Excellency please send us a Requisition upon the Governor of Ohio. and name C. Butts of this City as a Suitable & trustworthy person to make the arrest of Deft. & deliver him to the custody of the Jailor here, Col Foley is anxious that he be brought to justice or punished if guilty

Very Respectfully
Your Oby Srvt.
B. W. Foley Clerk
By A. C. Ellis D C

Requisition upon Gov of Ohio for Jas Washington (of color)
C Butts apptd. Agent
31st Oct/65
